headline: Thermo Fisher Scientific (TMO): Assessing Valuation After a 10% Monthly Share Price Surge
summary: Thermo Fisher Scientific (TMO) has caught investors’ attention lately as its shares climbed more than 10% over the past month. The company’s strong recent momentum has some market watchers reassessing its long-term prospects. See our latest analysis for Thermo Fisher Scientific. After a period of sluggishness earlier this year, Thermo Fisher Scientific's 10% share price surge over the past month stands out. This supports a positive year-to-date gain and helps lift its one-year total...
